abstract: The Carlyle Group and BC Partners have agreed to buy Hamilton Sundstrand Industrial, a maker of industrial pumps and compressors, from United Technologies for $3.46 billion.
snippet: The Carlyle Group and BC Partners have agreed to buy Hamilton Sundstrand Industrial, a maker of industrial pumps and compressors, from United Technologies for $3.46 billion.
lead_paragraph: United Technologies is a step closer to paying for its takeover of the Goodrich Corporation.

headline.main: 2 Private Equity Firms to Buy United Technologies Unit for $3.46 Billion
